701717f-b.text:
(1)
Roberts Ave., at the S.E. corner of Mahan Ave., showing the
Church of Our Lady of the Assumption (R.C.)
July 17, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of the belfry.
July 17, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
A view of the church and the rectory (extreme right) as seen from Mahan Ave. The rectory bears No. 1634 on the latter Ave.
Jily 17, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
